title: Microsoft Teams: Speaker recognition and attribution for all Teams Rooms on Windows
description:
Intelligent speaker recognition is being enabled for all Teams Rooms on Windows environments, with intelligent speakers or on existing speakers via the cloud. This feature identifies and attributes people in live transcripts, utilizing a unique "voiceprint" for each participant. Copilot in Teams can deliver meeting summaries, insights, and action items attributing contributions to individual speakers. Users can enroll voices in the Teams Desktop. Learn more at the link below.
More info: https://aka.ms/voiceprofile
